main event: A sighting of an unidentified flying object was reported in Parryville, Missouri on March 6, 1960.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 2-3 minutes,The witness was elderly and had poor eyesight, leading to potential reliability issues in the observation,The object was described as flat and approximately the size of a pie pan,The color of the object was described as golden and brilliant,The report suggests that the object could have been a weather balloon or a reflection rather than an aircraft.
witness description: an elderly male with poor eyesight
